participant_1.background:
My family is very supportive and understands my condition.
I love my cats and badminton.
I like to look at travel websites to plan my next vacation.
I enjoy relaxing in my free time by watching cartoons.
I am a quiet, but hardworking individual who is eager to learn and contribute to your company.

participant_2.background:
I have a student id and hate paying my bills.
I love sharing my love of comic books and animals with others.
I've been single for a while because I'm always on the go with my work and my dreams of going to Mars.
I love making short films with my camcorder.
I've never been to a fortune teller, but I'm not really interested in knowing my future.

content.text: Doing well, thanks! Just got home from work. Yourself?
Good! Just got done with my class. So what do you do for work?
I'm a customer service representative at a call center. What about you?
I'm a student at the university. I'm studying film and television.
Oh that's awesome! I love movies. What kind of films do you like to watch?
I love all kinds of movies. I'm really into sci-fi and fantasy, but I also love comedies and dramas.
Same here! I love sci-fi and fantasy movies. I'm also a big fan of comic books.
That's awesome! I love comic books too. I'm really into Marvel and DC.
Me too! I'm a big fan of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
Me too! I'm really excited for the new Avengers movie.
Me too! I think it's going to be amazing.
It's going to be the biggest movie of the year!
I can't wait to see it!
